commands.description: Downloads a quarantine email message's raw data.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-download

commands.description: Forwards the message to another recipient. The message remains in the folder and will be moved to the deleted_folder if specified.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-forward

commands.description: Trace and analyze information about messages after they have been filtered by the Proofpoint Protection Server.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-smart-search

commands.description: Creates a new end user resource with the specified email address.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-create-user

commands.description: Gets the end user resource with the specified email address or UID.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-get-user

commands.description: Search for quarantined messages.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-messages-list

commands.description: Deletes the message from the quarantine folder. The message is removed from its folder and moved to the deleted_folder if specified.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-delete

commands.description: Delete a user profile.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-delete-user

commands.description: Modifies a user profile.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-modify-user

commands.description: Resubmits the message to the filtering modules. The message is removed from the folder and will not be moved to any folder.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-resubmit

commands.description: Releases the message to the email infrastructure without further scanning. The message remains in the folder and will be moved to the `deleted_folder` if specified.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-release

commands.description: Moves the message to the specified target folder.
commands.name: proofpoint-pps-quarantine-message-move

commands.description: Download quarantine email message by ID.
commands.name: proofpoint-download-email

commands.description: Retrieves quarantined email messages.
commands.name: proofpoint-quarantine-messages

commands.description: Release email with virus scan
commands.name: proofpoint-release-email

commands.description: Removes an email address from blocked senders list.
commands.name: proofpoint-remove-from-blocked-senders-list

commands.description: Removes an email address from safe senders list.
commands.name: proofpoint-remove-from-safe-senders-list

commands.description: Adds an email address to blocked senders list.
commands.name: proofpoint-add-to-blocked-senders-list

commands.description: Searches for emails.
commands.name: proofpoint-smart-search

commands.description: Returns a list of quarantined folders.
commands.name: proofpoint-quarantine-folders

commands.description: Adds an email address to safe senders list.
commands.name: proofpoint-add-to-safe-senders-list

integration.description: Deprecated. The integration uses an unsupported scraping API. Use Proofpoint Protection Server v2 instead.
integration.name: Proofpoint Protection Server (Deprecated)

playbook.description: This playbook retrieves a specified EML/MSG file directly from the Proofpoint Protection Server.
playbook.name: Get Email From Email Gateway - Proofpoint Protection Server
